text: he eemaan vaalo! tumapar nihat vyaktiyon ke baare mein qisaas (baraabaree ka badala) anivaary[1] kar diya gaya hai. svatantr ka badala svatantr se liya jaayega, daas ka daas se aur naaree ka naaree se. jis aparaadhee ke lie usake bhaee kee or se kuchh kshama kar[2] diya jaaye, to use saamaany niyam ka anusaran (anupaalan) karana chaahiye. nihat vyakti ke vaaris ko bhalaee ke saath diyat (arthadand) chuka dena chaahiye. ye tumhaare paalanahaar kee or se suvidha tatha daya hai. isapar bhee jo atyaachaar[3] kare, to usake lie duhkhadaayee yaatana hai
